content.text:
HON. BEN RAY LUJAN

                             of new mexico

                    in the house of representatives

                       Thursday, November 9, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. BEN RAY LUJAN of New Mexico. Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably 
detained. Had I been present, I would have voted YEA on Roll Call No. 
612.
content.speaker: Mr. BEN RAY LUJAN of New Mexico
